title: 关于1.9 /playound声音的填写格式
author: mineconan
txt_content:
rt
            
/playsound random.anvil_break voice @a  ~ ~ ~ 100
/playsound random.levelup voice @a ~ ~ ~ 100

上面的指令到1.9就废了
想让cb发出铁砧“叮”的一声（或者玩家升级的声音）

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
因为音效名字改了
block.anvil.break
entity.player.levelup

https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... 0.E6.8D.AE.E5.80.BC
https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Sounds.json#Java_Edition_values
